short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower your workflow with Gimli Bootstrap: The smart DevTools extension for Bootstrap developers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feature Highlights 🔥

✔️ Smart Autocomplete: 
Intelligent suggestions for class names, making your coding experience lightning-fast. Plus, it even supports CSS property searches.

✔️ Instant feedback: Preview changes on hover, allowing you to fine-tune styles effortlessly.

✔️ Works on any website. 

✔️ Quickly toggle class values with Cmd/Ctrl + Click.

✔️ Intuitive UI
We don't want to overwhelm developers with options and inputs. Here’s a list of features that enable developers to find relevant classes quickly:

➤ Variant Override: Displays the active responsive class.
➤ Some sections like Grid and Flex appear only when relevant.
➤ Active inputs remain in view.
➤ Customizable Look: Tailor the UI to your preferences.

🔒 Privacy Matters:
Rest assured, Gimli Bootstrap respects your privacy:

➤ Zero Data Collection: We never gather personal information, browsing history, or any sensitive data.
➤ Focused on Functionality: Our sole purpose is to enhance your Bootstrap development experience.
